CustomField.description: If set, overrides the default Group to which this Assignment's Timecard Cost Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if the Project or Resource are in a different Group. Note that either way, the Timecard Cost Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals and same Resource's Resource Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, overrides the default Group to which this Assignment's Timecard Cost Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if the Project or Resource are in a different Group.
CustomField.label: Override Timecard Cost Group
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Override Timecard Cost Group For Assignments
